item.title: California Was Never The ‘Homeland’ Of Mexican Invaders
item.description: The notion that California and the Southwest are a Mexican 'homeland' is absurd if you look at the history of the region.

item.title: SBC Passes Resolution Demanding FDA ‘Immediately Revoke’ Mifepristone Approval
item.description: The resolution acknowledges the abortion pill causes unborn babies deaths and ‘physical, emotional, and spiritual harm to the mother.’

item.title: Same-Day Registration Is Too Easily Gamed By Leftists
item.description: Same-day registration has become a way to flood the zone with mystery voters — officials lack the time to validate registrations.
